name: Magic Lantern
description: Magic Lantern VR is a cozy virtual room for the whole family, where you can watch your favorite stories, play games, draw pictures, and generally have fun. Journey into a magical, spellbinding world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980, AMD R9-290x or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
